overview: This educational program hosted by Farmer Bill gives kids an up-close look at life on a high-tech, 700-cow dairy farm as they learn how moo juice goes from cow to cup and witness the feeding and milking processes. Later, children meet a newborn calf and visit a plant to see how cheese is made. Aimed at youngsters ages 2 to 10, the video teaches them about the realities of modern farming and the effort required to get food to market.
title: Vrrrooommm!: Dairy Farming for Kids
